titleStmt.title: The pilgrime of Loreto Performing his vow made to the glorious Virgin Mary Mother of God. Conteyning diuers deuout meditations vpon the Christian and Cath. doctrine. By Fa. Lewis Richeome of the Society of Iesus. Written in French, & translated into English by E.W.
Pélerin de Lorète. English
titleStmt.author: Richeome, Louis, 1544-1625.

titleStmt.title: The pilgrime of Loreto Performing his vow made to the glorious Virgin Mary Mother of God. Conteyning diuers deuout meditations vpon the Christian and Cath. doctrine. By Fa. Lewis Richeome of the Society of Iesus. Written in French, & translated into English by E.W.
Pélerin de Lorète. English
titleStmt.author: Richeome, Louis, 1544-1625.
Walpole, Edward, 1560-1637, attributed name.
E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676, attributed name.
Weston, Edward, 1566-1635, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: E.W. = Edward Walpole? Edward Worsley? Edward Weston?.
A translation of: Le pélerin de Lorète.
The imprint is false; in fact printed in Saint-Omer at the English College Press (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
